column4: i want to remove Totem, but it depends on ubuntu-desktop, can I remove that?  or is that bad?
its something you'll want to reinstall if you ever upgrade the whole distro but its actually a meta package, doesnt contain anything but a list of other packages really
so it won't remove those other packages, right?
should be fine, only reason i mentioned the installing it later if you distro upgrade is i hear it makes it a bit smoother
